delivery: We carefully package our macarons and use Royal Mail to post them to you under first class postage. We do not ship to international addresses outside of the UK.
details: Enjoy the taste of our indulgent Chocolate Orange Macarons. Bursting with 100% natural flavours, our perfectly proportioned treats are handcrafted in our kitchen and beautifully packaged for your enjoyment.
name: Caramel Apple
